books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: As dust storms roll during the Great Depression, Elsa must choose between saving the family and farm or heading West.
books.name: THE FOUR WINDS

books.author: by J.D. Robb
books.description: The 52nd book of the In Death series. Eve Dallas investigates the murder of a young sculptor in the West Village.
books.name: FAITHLESS IN DEATH

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: A friendship between two women in the Pacific Northwest endures for more than three decades.
books.name: FIREFLY LANE

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: The fifth book in the Torpedo Ink series. One of the motorcycle club’s members needs a second chance after thinking an intimate encounter was just a dream.
books.name: RECKLESS ROAD

books.author: by Julia Quinn
books.description: The first book in the Bridgerton series. Daphne Bridgerton’s reputation soars when she colludes with the Duke of Hastings. The basis of the Netflix series “Bridgerton.”
books.name: THE DUKE AND I

books.author: by Matt Haig
books.description: Nora Seed finds a library beyond the edge of the universe that contains books with multiple possibilities of the lives one could have lived.
books.name: THE MIDNIGHT LIBRARY

books.author: by Laurell K. Hamilton
books.description: The 28th book in the Anita Blake, Vampire Hunter series. The king of wererats fights to defend his crown.
books.name: RAFAEL

books.author: by Sarah Pearse
books.description: Elin Warner must find her estranged brother’s fiancée, who goes missing as a storm approaches a hotel that was once a sanatorium in the Swiss Alps.
books.name: THE SANATORIUM

books.author: by Julia Quinn
books.description: The second book in the Bridgerton series. Kate Sheffield gets in the way of Anthony Bridgerton's intent to marry.
books.name: THE VISCOUNT WHO LOVED ME

books.author: by Brit Bennett
books.description: The lives of twin sisters who run away from a Southern Black community at age 16 diverge as one returns and the other takes on a different racial identity but their fates intertwine.
books.name: THE VANISHING HALF

books.author: by James Patterson and James O. Born
books.description: The 13th book in the Michael Bennett series. An assassin killing a number of women might disrupt the detective’s wedding plans.
books.name: THE RUSSIAN

books.author: by Janet Skeslien Charles
books.description: A teenager in Montana discovers that her elderly neighbor worked decades earlier at the American Library in Paris and was part of the Resistance.
books.name: THE PARIS LIBRARY

books.author: by V.E. Schwab
books.description: A Faustian bargain comes with a curse that affects the adventure Addie LaRue has across centuries.
books.name: THE INVISIBLE LIFE OF ADDIE LARUE

books.author: by Julia Quinn
books.description: The fourth book in the Bridgerton series. Penelope Featherington and Colin Bridgerton discover each other's secrets.
books.name: ROMANCING MISTER BRIDGERTON

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING
